description: create a new procedure with transaction
body:
-- ================================================
--USE [DB123]
--GO
-- ================================================
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
/*====================================================================
Author					:		Npdat132
Create date				:		$DATE(dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss)$
Description				:		
====================================================================*/
CREATE PROCEDURE $tensp$
(
	  @$CURSOR$	INT
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	BEGIN TRY
		BEGIN TRANSACTION $tentran$
			
		COMMIT TRANSACTION $tentran$
		
	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH
		IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
			BEGIN
				ROLLBACK TRANSACTION $tentran$
			END	

		INSERT INTO dbo.Log
		    (
		         CreateDateTime
		       , CreateBy
		       , Content
		    )
		VALUES
		    (
		         GETDATE()
		       , N'$tensp$'
		       , N'Lá»—i [$tensp$] - Err: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() + ' Line: ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ERROR_LINE())
		    )
	END CATCH
END
GO
